title: Everything Is Stupid: Adventure Playgrounds | Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
itunes:title: Everything Is Stupid: Adventure Playgrounds | Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
description:
Ronny Chieng gives his take on the risky rise of "adventure playgrounds" in urban areas, and author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie discusses her book "Dear Ijeawele."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
